scripts.rename: node -e "const r=process.argv[1]; const u=r.toUpperCase(); const t=r.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+r.slice(1).toLowerCase(); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function walk(dir){const files=fs.readdirSync(dir); files.forEach(f=>{const p=path.join(dir,f); const s=fs.statSync(p); if(s.isDirectory()&&!p.includes('node_modules')&&!p.includes('.git')&&!p.includes('.turbo')){walk(p)}else if(s.isFile()&&!p.includes('bun.lock')){try{let c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'); const o=c; c=c.replace(/\bacme\b/g,r).replace(/\bAcme/g,t).replace(/\bACME\b/g,u); if(c!==o){fs.writeFileSync(p,c); console.log('Updated: '+p)}}catch(e){}}})} walk('.'); console.log('Done! Run bun install to update dependencies.');"
